      • chronicMedications

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HealthRecord.Medication> chronicMedications

      • record

        public HealthRecord record
        The active health record.

      • defaultRecord

        public HealthRecord defaultRecord
        Default health record. If "lossOfCareEnabled" is true, this is also the record with entries that were covered by insurance.

      • lossOfCareRecord

        public HealthRecord lossOfCareRecord
        Only used if "lossOfCareEnabled" is true. In that case, this health record contains entries that should have, but did not, occur.

      • lossOfCareEnabled

        public boolean lossOfCareEnabled
        Experimental feature flag. When "lossOfCareEnabled" is true, patients can miss care due to cost or lack of health insurance coverage.

      • records

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,HealthRecord> records
        Individual provider health records (if "hasMultipleRecords" is enabled).

      • hasMultipleRecords

        public boolean hasMultipleRecords
        Flag that enables each provider having a different health record for each patient. In other words, the patients entire record is split across provider systems.

      • history

        public java.util.List<State> history
        History of the currently active module.

      • coverage

        public CoverageRecord coverage
        Record of insurance coverage.

      • ageInDecimalYears

        public double ageInDecimalYears(long time)
        Returns a person's age in decimal years. (ex. 7.5 ~ 7 years 6 months old)
        Parameters:
        time - The time when their age should be calculated.
        Returns:
        decimal age in years

      • ageInMonths

        public int ageInMonths(long time)
        Return the persons age in months at a given time.
        Parameters:
        time - The time when their age should be calculated.
        Returns:
        age in months. Can never be less than zero, even if given a time before they were born.

      • ageInYears

        public int ageInYears(long time)
        Returns the persons age in years at the given time.
        Parameters:
        time - The time when their age should be calculated.
        Returns:
        age in years. Can never be less than zero, even if given a time before they were born.

      • canAffordPayer

        public boolean canAffordPayer(Payer payer)
        Returns whether or not a person can afford a given payer. If a person's income is greater than a year of montlhy premiums + deductible then they can afford the insurance.
        Parameters:
        payer - the payer to check.

      • checkToPayMonthlyPremium

        public void checkToPayMonthlyPremium(long time)
        Checks if the person has paid their monthly premium. If not, the person pays the premium to their current payer.
        Parameters:
        time - the time that the person checks to pay premium.

      • getQolsForYear

        public double getQolsForYear(int year)
        Returns the person's QOL at the given time.
        Parameters:
        year - the year to get QOL data.
